doc.field: NORTH AMERICAN PHILIPS NPH> UNIT NAMES EXECUTIVE

North American Philips Corp said Lyman Beggs has been named president of its Consumer Products Divisions. The company said Beggs, formerly executive vice president of Tambrands Inc TMB>, succeeds Richard Kress, who retired. The company said approximately 58 pct of the common stock of North American Philips is owned by N.V. Philips of the Netherlands. Reuter
